content:
# It seems we do not have enough materials to craft another iron gear wheel. We currently have:
# - 2 iron plates (after the recent smelting)
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# To craft an iron gear wheel, we need 2 iron plates. Since we have 2 plates, we can craft one more iron gear wheel.

# Let's proceed to craft one more iron gear wheel now that we have the required materials.
craft_item(Prototype.IronGearWheel)  # Craft one iron gear wheel.
print(f"Crafted Iron Gear Wheel. Updated Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting.
